name: LEGO® STAR WARS™: THE FORCE AWAKENS
description: LEGO® Star Wars™: The Force Awakens marks the triumphant return of the No. 1 LEGO® videogame franchise and immerses fans in the new Star Wars™ adventure like never before. Players can relive the epic action from the blockbuster film in a way that only LEGO® can offer, featuring all of the storylines from Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, retold through the clever and witty LEGO® lens. The game will also feature exclusive playable content that takes players on adventures between Star Wars™: Return of the Jedi™ and Star Wars™: The Force Awakens, providing additional insight about the new movie and its characters.
